#DTM - stellar mass relation at z=0 to z=7 in Vijayan et al. 2019
#Column 1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15 = log(M*) [Msun] at z=0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
#Column 2,4,6,8,10,12,14,16 = DTM at z=0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
